entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:26 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
